【考法 1】 vt. 扭曲，歪曲：to twist out of the true meaning or proportion
【例】 A painter may exaggerate[ɪɡ'zædʒəret]夸大 or distort shapes and forms.
【例】The coach's message was so distorted after passing through so many people that it was unintelligible.
【近】 deform, misshape, torture, falsify, misinterpret, misrepresent, pervert, twist
【记】 torture 酷刑折磨，一般都是扭曲人的身体
【另】 torture 折磨，tortuous 曲折的 contort 扭曲，distort 歪曲 extort 敲诈勒索 retort 反驳,
